add_messages.text: Your order #A87652 has been processed and will be shipped today.

add_notes.title: Vendor Contacts
add_notes.body:
# Vendor Contact Information

## Main Suppliers

- Vendor A: 555-1111, contact: Sarah Johnson
- Vendor B: 555-2222, contact: Michael Brown
- Supplier C: 555-3333, contact: David Wilson
- Warehouse: 555-4444, contact: Lisa Thompson

## Order Process

All orders should be documented in the OrderRecord.md file with the following information:
- Order number
- Date
- Vendor
- Amount
- Expected delivery
